task.title: CICD Walkthrough: Create a Project and Deploy an App
task.abstract: This walkthrough starts with creating a new project and ends with your app deployed to the target of your choice.

taskbody.prereq:
You will need:
an application [if they don't have one, can they use one of our toy apps?] to deploy
an instance of the CICD tool
the information [TBD as we move on] from a target environment
